name: SystemImageParameters
summary: Dictionary object of parameters for the 2nd parameter of the <Titanium.UI.iOS.systemButton> method to pass additional configuration options like weight and size. Available in Titanium SDK 10.1.0 and later.

properties.name: size
properties.summary: The symbol point size to use for the SF Symbol

properties.name: weight
properties.summary: The symbol weight to use for the SF Symbol. Can be one of ultralight, light, thin, normal, semibold, bold, heavy or black.
